thread.title: Why Abortion Rights Are Vital For Boko Haram Rape Survivors In Nigeria
thread.title_full: Why Abortion Rights Are Vital For Boko Haram Rape Survivors In Nigeria

author: The Huffington Post News Team
title: Why Abortion Rights Are Vital For Boko Haram Rape Survivors In Nigeria
text: Troops Take Nigerian Town From Boko Haram of   Chadian soldiers returning from the Nigerian city of Damasak, Nigeria, sit in a helicopter Wednesday March 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Jerome Delay) A rocket propelled launcher hangs on the mirror of a camouflaged Chadian pickup truck in the Nigerian city of Damasak, Nigeria, Wednesday, March 18, 2015.(AP Photo/Jerome Delay) A Chadian soldier raises his automatic weapon to have his picture taken by another soldier in the Nigerian city of Damasak, Nigeria, Wednesday March 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Jerome Delay) Chadian soldiers escorting a group of journalists ride on trucks and pickups in the Nigerian city of Damasak, Nigeria, Wednesday March 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Jerome Delay) Chadian soldiers transfer weapons seized from Boko Haram fighters to a helicopter in the Nigerian city of Damasak, Nigeria, Wednesday March 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Jerome Delay) Chadian soldiers escorting a group of journalists walk in the city of Damasak, Nigeria, Wednesday March 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Jerome Delay) Chadian soldiers listen to their commander in the Nigerian city of Damasak, Nigeria, Wednesday March 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Jerome Delay) A Chadian soldiers walks in the city of Damasak, Nigeria, Wednesday, March 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Jerome Delay) Chadian soldiers escorting a group of journalists ride on trucks and pickups in the Nigerian city of Damasak, Nigeria, Wednesday March 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Jerome Delay)  Share
